statements: UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET configuration = '{"network": "public"}' WHERE service_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET network_type = 'private' WHERE service_name = 'service1';
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET configuration = '{"network": "private"}' WHERE service_name = 'service2' AND network_type = 'public';
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET configuration = jsonb_set(configuration, '{firewall_rule}', '{"port": 8080, "protocol": "TCP"}', true) WHERE service_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET configuration = configuration - 'firewall_rule' WHERE service_name = 'web_service';

UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET configuration = jsonb_set(jsonb_set(configuration, '{firewall_rule}', '{"port": 443, "protocol": "TCP"}', true), '{network_type}', '"Private"', true) WHERE service_name = 'database_service';
UPDATE network_configurations SET service_name = 'New Service Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE service_providers SET provider_name = 'New Provider Name' WHERE provider_id = 1;
UPDATE network_configurations SET configuration_json = '{"key": "value"}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE network_configurations SET configuration_json = '{"key1": "value1", "key2": "value2"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE service_providers SET provider_location = 'New Location' WHERE provider_id = 2;
UPDATE network_configurations SET configuration_json = '{"key3": "updated_value", "key4": "new_value"}' WHERE service_name = 'ServiceABC';
UPDATE network_services SET service_name = 'New Service Name' WHERE service_id = 1;
UPDATE network_configs SET config_name = 'New Config Name' WHERE config_id = 1;
UPDATE network_subscribers SET subscriber_email = 'new.email@example.com' WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
UPDATE network_services SET service_name = 'New Service Name' WHERE service_id = 1;
UPDATE network_configs SET config_name = 'Config Updated' WHERE config_id = 1;
UPDATE network_subscribers SET subscriber_name = 'John Doe', subscriber_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkProviders SET provider_name = 'New Provider Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET device_name = 'New Device Name' WHERE device_id = 123;
UPDATE NetworkConnections SET status = 'Active' WHERE connection_id = 456;
UPDATE NetworkProviders SET provider_name = 'Updated Provider 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET configuration = '{"key": "value"}' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE NetworkConnections SET status = 'Active' WHERE connection_id = 3;
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET ip_address='192.168.1.100' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ServiceProviders SET provider_name='New Provider' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Devices SET status='Active' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET gateway_address = '192.168.1.1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Devices SET status = 'Active' WHERE provider_id = 2;
UPDATE Subscriptions SET subscription_type = 'Premium' WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
